_comments._overview: Theme configuration system — controls visibility of theme controls and default selections for color theme, font, and dark mode.
_comments._runtime_usage: Consumed by src/lib/theme-ui-config.ts, src/components/configured-theme-provider.tsx, and src/contexts/theme-context.tsx. JSON must remain valid; this _comments block documents keys without affecting runtime.
_comments.ui: UI control visibility — determines which theme controls appear in the header.
_comments.ui.showThemeSelector: Show/hide theme selector (list of complete themes defined in lib/theme-config.ts#completeThemes). When hidden, users cannot change the color theme.
_comments.ui.showFontToggle: Show/hide font selector (values from lib/theme-config.ts#availableFonts). When hidden, users cannot change the font.
_comments.ui.showThemeToggle: Show/hide light/dark mode toggle (next-themes). When hidden, users cannot manually switch light/dark.
_comments.defaults: Default selections — set initial theme/font/darkMode for branded deployments. These act as defaults; to lock them, hide the corresponding toggles in ui.*.
_comments.defaults.theme: Default complete theme (e.g., 'cosmic-night', 'elegant-luxury'). null = use saved user choice (localStorage) or library default. Does NOT lock selection by itself — hide selector to lock.
_comments.defaults.font: Default font (e.g., 'inter', 'poppins'). null = use saved user choice or theme default. Does NOT lock selection by itself — hide font toggle to lock.
_comments.defaults.darkMode: Default light/dark preference. true = start dark, false = start light, null = 'system'. Does NOT lock selection by itself — hide theme toggle to lock.
_comments._priority: Priority: user localStorage (if present) > defaults.* (theme/font/darkMode) > library/system defaults.
_comments._validation: defaults.theme must exist in completeThemes; defaults.font must exist in availableFonts. See src/lib/theme-ui-config.ts validation helpers.
_comments._usage: Used by ThemeProvider (darkMode default), Header/ThemeSelector (visibility), and ThemeColorProvider (initial theme/font and persistence).
